flavorText: Each individual has their own crucial role to play.

foreignData.flavorText: Jeder Einzelne hat seine entscheidende Rolle zu spielen.
foreignData.name: Eingeübte Taktik
foreignData.text: Bestimme eine angreifende oder blockende Kreatur deiner Wahl. Die Eingeübte Taktik fügt der Kreatur Schadenspunkte in Höhe der doppelten Anzahl an Kreaturen in deiner Abenteurergruppe zu. (Deine Abenteurergruppe besteht aus bis zu je einem Kleriker, Krieger, Räuber und Zauberer)

foreignData.flavorText: Cada uno tiene un papel esencial que cumplir.
foreignData.name: Tácticas ensayadas
foreignData.text: Elige la criatura atacante o bloqueadora objetivo. Las Tácticas ensayadas hacen una cantidad de daño igual al doble de la cantidad de criaturas en tu grupo a esa criatura. (Tu grupo consiste en hasta un Clérigo, un Bribón, un Guerrero y un Hechicero.)

foreignData.flavorText: Chaque individu a un rôle crucial à jouer.
foreignData.name: Tactique maîtrisée
foreignData.text: Choisissez une créature attaquante ou bloqueuse ciblée. La Tactique maîtrisée inflige à cette créature un nombre de blessures égal au double du nombre de créatures dans votre groupe. (Votre groupe est composé de jusqu'à un clerc, un gredin, un guerrier et un sorcier.)

foreignData.flavorText: Ogni individuo ha un ruolo cruciale da svolgere.
foreignData.name: Tattiche Perfezionate
foreignData.text: Scegli una creatura attaccante o bloccante bersaglio. Le Tattiche Perfezionate infliggono a quella creatura danno pari al doppio del numero di creature nella tua compagnia. (La tua compagnia può includere fino a un Chierico, un Farabutto, un Guerriero e un Mago.)

foreignData.flavorText: 各自に果たすべき重要な役割がある。
foreignData.name: 訓練された戦術
foreignData.text: 攻撃クリーチャー１体かブロック・クリーチャー１体を対象とする。訓練された戦術はそのクリーチャーに、あなたのパーティーを構成しているクリーチャーの総数の２倍に等しい点数のダメージを与える。（あなたのパーティーは、ウィザードとクレリックと戦士とならず者それぞれ最大１体から構成される。）

foreignData.flavorText: 개개인에게는 각자 행해야 할 중요한 역할이 있다.
foreignData.name: 훈련한 전술
foreignData.text: 공격 중이거나 방어 중인 생물을 목표로 정한다. 훈련한 전술은 그 생물에게 당신의 파티에 있는 생물 수의 두 배만큼 피해를 입힌다. (당신의 파티에는 성직자, 도적, 전사, 마법사가 각각 최대 한 개씩 포함된다.)

foreignData.flavorText: Cada indivíduo tem seu próprio papel crucial a desempenhar.
foreignData.name: Táticas Praticadas
foreignData.text: Escolha a criatura atacante ou bloqueadora alvo. Táticas Praticadas causa àquela criatura uma quantidade de dano igual a duas vezes o número de criaturas em seu grupo. (Seu grupo consiste em até um membro de cada um dos seguintes tipos: Clérigo, Ladino, Guerreiro e Mago.)

foreignData.flavorText: Каждый здесь играет свою критическую роль.
foreignData.name: Отработанная Тактика
foreignData.text: Выберите целевое атакующее или блокирующее существо. Отработанная Тактика наносит тому существу повреждения, равные удвоенному количеству существ в вашем отряде. (В вашем отряде может быть не более одного Бродяги, Воина, Священника и Чародея.)

foreignData.flavorText: 每个人都是团队不可或缺的一份子。
foreignData.name: 熟练战法
foreignData.text: 选择目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物。熟练战法对该生物造成伤害，其数量等同于你冒险团中生物数量的两倍。（冒险团由僧侣、浪客、战士和法术师组成，每种类别至多只计入一个。）

foreignData.flavorText: 每個人都是團隊不可或缺的一份子。
foreignData.name: 熟練戰法
foreignData.text: 選擇目標進行攻擊或阻擋的生物。熟練戰法對該生物造成傷害，其數量等同於你冒險團中生物數量的兩倍。（冒險團由僧侶、浪客、戰士和魔法師組成，每種類別至多只計入一個。）

name: Practiced Tactics
originalText: Choose target attacking or blocking creature. Practiced Tactics deals damage to that creature equal to twice the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)

rulings.text: To determine “the number of creatures in your party,” check whether you control a Cleric, whether you control a Rogue, whether you control a Warrior, and whether you control a Wizard. The number is the total number of those checks to which you answered yes. Each creature you control can be counted for only one of those checks.

If a creature has more than one party creature type, and there are multiple ways to count that creature that could result in a different number of creatures in your party, the highest such number is used. For example, if you control a Cleric and a Cleric Wizard, the number of creatures in your party is two. You can’t choose to have it be just one by counting the Cleric Wizard first as a Cleric.

An ability referring to the number of creatures in your party gets a number from zero to four. Such abilities never ask which creatures are in your party, and you never have to designate specific creatures as being in your party. You can’t choose to exclude creatures from this count to lower the number.

text: Choose target attacking or blocking creature. Practiced Tactics deals damage to that creature equal to twice the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
